guest_info.name: Joel Schaub
guest_info.title: Vice President of Lending
guest_info.production_level: Closed 319 transactions for $126 million last year

main_topics: Current Mortgage Rates and Market Conditions

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Clients waiting for interest rates to drop before buying
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Encourage clients to buy now with less competition and refinance later when rates drop.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Agents not proactively reaching out to potential clients
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Call renters and educate them on current market conditions and buying opportunities.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Buyers hesitant due to high rates
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Use seller credits for temporary rate buy downs to lower initial payments.

target_avatars.relevance: This episode provides strategies to engage potential buyers in a slow market.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Educate your clients on market conditions and use creative financing options to close deals.

target_avatars.relevance: Offers insights on how to maintain high transaction volumes even in a challenging market.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on education and value to build long-term client relationships and increase transactions.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: The strategy that makes the most sense is be comfortable with the payments where the rates are at today. Go out and buy a property when there's not much competition and then refinance the loan down the line.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: It provides a clear, actionable strategy for hesitant buyers.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Why waiting for lower rates might cost you more in the long run.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Right now, we're locking in clients back in rates in the three's and four's for the next couple of years while rates are higher, using seller paid closing costs.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Challenges the notion that high rates are a barrier to buying.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: How to secure a lower mortgage rate even in today's market.

key_tactics.tactic: Use temporary rate buy downs to lower initial mortgage payments.
key_tactics.context: Apply this tactic when clients are hesitant to buy due to high interest rates.

key_tactics.tactic: Educate renters about the benefits of buying now versus waiting.
key_tactics.context: Reach out to renters in your network to discuss current market conditions.

quotable_insights: If you can take off your selling shoes and put on your education and helping shoes, you're going to grow your business.
Lead with honesty and get your plan together for 2023.

resources_mentioned.name: Freddie Mac
resources_mentioned.context: To check area median income for loan programs.

episode_summary: In this episode, Joel Schaub discusses strategies for navigating the current real estate market, focusing on the use of temporary rate buy downs to make buying more attractive despite higher interest rates. He emphasizes the importance of educating clients and leveraging loan officer relationships to provide value and close more deals. The episode provides actionable insights for agents looking to maintain and grow their business in a challenging market.
